translation.en: -♪ Chico ♪ -♪ Bon Bon ♪
♪ Chico, Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
♪ Chico Bon Bon Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
translation.de: Chico Bon Bon Chico, Chico Bon Bon

translation.en: ♪ Chico, Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
♪ Chico Bon Bon Chico, Chico Bon Bon Bon ♪
translation.de: Chico Bon Bon Chico, Chico Bon Bon, Bon

translation.en: ♪ Monkey, monkey A monkey with a tool belt ♪ ♪ Monkey, monkey A monkey with a tool belt ♪
♪ Monkey, monkey A monkey with a tool belt ♪
-I saw a m-m-monkey! -[all] Tool belt!
♪ Chico, Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
♪ Chico Bon Bon Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
translation.de: Chico Bon Bon Chico, Chico Bon Bon

translation.en: ♪ Chico, Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪ ♪ Chico, Chico, Chico Bon Bon ♪
translation.de: Chico, Chico, Chico Bon Bon Chico, Chico, Chico Bon Bon

translation.en: Monkey with a tool belt!
[Rainbow] "Chico Bon Bon and the Ice Cream Monster!"
translation.de: Chico Bon Bon und das Eismonster!

translation.en: I scream, you scream, we all scream for…
translation.de: Ich will Eis, du willst Eis, wir alle wollen…

translation.en: Ice cream?
Chico, I love that you've re-engineered my Fridgey Boo Boo
translation.de: Chico, ich liebe den Umbau meines Kühlschranki-Tankis,

translation.en: to make ice cream,
but it keeps coming out melty.
Oh, I think I see the problem, Mrs. Coleslaw.
translation.de: Ich glaube, das ist das Problem.

translation.en: There must be something wrong with Fridgey's insulation.
translation.de: Etwas stimmt nicht mit der Isolierung.

translation.en: Oh dear! His what, now?
Insulation.
Check it out. Fridgey Boo Boo's got a freezing machine to make ice cream,
translation.de: Kühlschranki-Tanki macht mit einer Eismaschine Eis.

translation.en: and this foam material is insulation.
It's what keeps the ice cream cold once it's made.
The foam insulation makes it hard for heat to get in.
That's why Fridgey can keep things cold.
Looks like Fridgey Boo Boo doesn't have enough insulation.
translation.de: Kühlschranki-Tanki ist wohl nicht genug isoliert.

translation.en: That's why the ice cream comes out melty.
Oh no! What do we do, Chico?
translation.de: Oh nein! Was machen wir, Chico?

translation.en: Don't worry. I'll just add some more foam for better insulation.
translation.de: Keine Sorge, ich füge Schaum zur Isolierung hinzu.

translation.en: There. Now you've got the perfect ice cream making machine.
translation.de: So. Jetzt haben Sie die perfekte Eismaschine.

translation.en: Go on, give it a try.
Well, all right.
Nice and cold, just the way I like it.
translation.de: Schön kalt. So wie ich es mag.

translation.en: Insulation!
Thank you, Chico.
And thank you, Fridgey Boo Boo.
The banana phone!
Chico Bon Bon! You got a problem? We can solve 'em!
translation.de: Chico Bon Bon! Sie haben ein Problem? Wir lösen es!

translation.en: [in Italian accent] Freddy and Betty Lemuretti here.
Has this ever happened to you?
You're enjoying a delicious ice cream treat
when a giant monster grabs it right out of your hand?
translation.de: und ein Riesenmonster nimmt es euch weg.

translation.en: No, that's never happened to us.
Actually, it has happened to us.
[both] Us too!
More ice cream!
That monster ate all of our ice cream!
translation.de: Das Monster hat unser Eis gegessen!

translation.en: And she's still hungry!
translation.de: Und sie hat immer noch Hunger!

translation.en: More ice cream!
Say no more. We're on our way!
Fix-It Force, we need to feed that monster fast,
translation.de: Tüftler-Team, wir müssen das Monster füttern,

translation.en: or she'll destroy Blunderburg looking for more ice cream.
translation.de: oder sie zerstört Blunderburg auf ihrer Suche.

translation.en: It's time to bring the ice cold awesome!
translation.de: Jetzt zeigen wir, was wir können!

translation.en: [kids] Chico Bon Bon!
I'm Neil Ostrich here on the scene.
translation.de: Hier ist Neil Ostrich vom Tatort.

translation.en: Literally, on the scene.
There's a monster on the loose in Blunderburg and it's hungry for one thing:
translation.de: In Blunderburg wütet ein Monster, das nur eins will:

translation.en: ice cream!
I don't-- Whoa!
More ice cream!
Cones, sundaes, novelty treats…
No form of ice cream is safe!
Who can save the city from that ice-cream-craving creature?
translation.de: Wer kann die Stadt vor diesem Eis-Esser retten?

translation.en: More ice cream!
I'm Chico Bon Bon, monkey with a tool belt!
translation.de: Ich bin Chico Bon Bon, der Affe mit dem Werkzeuggürtel.

translation.en: And we're the Fix-It Force!
And that's one big monster!
translation.de: Und das ist ein großes Monster!

translation.en: Which means we need a monster-sized serving of ice cream to fill her tummy,
translation.de: Wir brauchen eine Riesenportion Eis für sie,

translation.en: so she'll never come after our ice cream again.
translation.de: damit sie unser Eis in Ruhe lässt.

translation.en: But Betty and I will never be able to make enough!
translation.de: So viel können Betty und ich nicht machen!

translation.en: Then what we need is all the ice cream left in Blunderburg.
translation.de: Dann brauchen wir das restliche Eis Blunderburgs.

translation.en: Operation Ice Cream begins now!
Our tastiest mission yet!
[Neil] As the Ice Cream Monster continues her rampage,
Mayor Murphy has declared a level-five ice cream emergency!
translation.de: und Bürgermeisterin Murphy ruft einen Eis-Notfall Stufe fünf aus!

translation.en: Citizens of Blunderburg, the Fix-It Force needs your ice cream!
translation.de: Bürger von Blunderburg, das Tüftler-Team braucht euer Eis!

translation.en: Thanks, Mayor!
-All right! -So much ice cream!
[Clark] Our bowl is full!
Then it's time to feed the monster!
More ice cream!
-[Chico] Quick! Release the ice cream! -Uh, Chico, I think we're too late.
translation.de: Schnell, das Eis! Chico, wir sind zu spät.

translation.en: What do you mean?
The ice cream's all melted!
No melty ice cream!
Okay, so she really doesn't like melty ice cream.
translation.de: Sie mag echt kein geschmolzenes Eis.

translation.en: We've gotta figure out a way to keep the ice cream cold long enough to feed that monster.
translation.de: Wir müssen das Eis lange genug kühlen, um das Monster zu füttern.

translation.en: Yeah, like with a freezer!
But it would need to be a monster-sized freezer.
A monster-sized freezer!
That's a great idea, Clark!
Rainbow, set a course to Mrs. Coleslaw's house.
translation.de: Rainbow, fahr zu Mrs. Coleslaws Haus.

translation.en: Chico, are you sure you wanna do this?
Remember what happened the last time Fridgey Boo Boo transformed into Fridgebot?
translation.de: Erinnerst du dich daran, als Kühlschranki-Tanki zu Kühl-Bot wurde?

translation.en: Oh, I remember!
He went through town shooting ice cubes at everything!
translation.de: Er ging durch die Stadt und schoss mit Eiswürfeln!

translation.en: I know, but he's our only hope.
Now presenting…
[Chico] Fridgebot 2.0, the perfect ice cream delivery machine.
Now with ice cream blasting power!
Too melty!
Oh! It just needs a little more insulation to keep all that ice cream cold.
translation.de: Etwas mehr Isolierung, um das Eis zu kühlen.

translation.en: And… we're good to go!
I even loaded up some new ice cream jokes.
Why do ice cream cones carry umbrellas?
translation.de: Was sind drei Kugeln Eis im Wasserkocher?

translation.en: Why?
Because there's always a chance of sprinkles!
More ice cream!
The Ice Cream Monster, she's coming this way!
We've gotta feed her, fast!
Let's go, Fridgebot!
Bye-bye, Fridgey! Have fun, now.
I'm reporting live from downtown Blunderburg,
translation.de: Ich berichte live aus der Innenstadt,

translation.en: where the hungry Ice Cream Monster is still searching for ice cr-- Whoa!
translation.de: wo das hungrige Eismonster noch immer nach…

translation.en: Nom? Ice cream?
More ice cream!
[Chico] Hey, Ice Cream Monster!
Okay, Fridgebot, do your thing! Ice cream blasters, go!
translation.de: Ok, Kühl-Bot, mach dein Ding! Eis-Kanonen, los!

translation.en: Activate booster cannons!
How's about a little strawberry and some chocolate chip!
translation.de: Wie wäre es mit Erdbeere und Schokolade?

translation.en: Ooh! Don't forget peanut butter!
And rainbow sprinkles!
[gasps] I think it's working!
More ice cream!
[Clark] What?
She still wants more?
I don't think she'll stop until she's totally full,
translation.de: Sie hört nicht auf, bis sie satt ist.

translation.en: and even Fridgebot can't feed her fast enough!
You're right, Rainbow.
We need to make her a super-sized bowl of ice cream so she can really chow down.
translation.de: Wir brauchen einen großen Eisbecher, den sie verschlingen kann.

translation.en: But where are we gonna find a bowl big enough to serve a giant monster?
translation.de: Aber wo finden wir einen Becher, der groß genug dafür ist?

translation.en: [Chico] Giant bowl… Giant bowl…
[gasps] The Blunderdome.
It's just the right size and shape
for the biggest, baddest bowl of ice cream ever!
translation.de: um den größten Eisbecher aller Zeiten zu machen!

translation.en: Fridgebot, fill it up!
Now, mint!
Now, vanilla!
Now, blunderberry!
And finally… the cherry on top.
translation.de: Und zum Schluss die Kirsche oben drauf.

translation.en: Whoa-ho-ho! That ought to be enough for the monster!
Uh… guys! The ice cream is already melting! We gotta keep it cold!
translation.de: Leute, das Eis schmilzt! Wir müssen es kühlen!

translation.en: We spent all this time collecting the ice cream and now it's going to melt!
translation.de: Wir sammelten so viel Eis, und jetzt schmilzt es!

translation.en: We have to figure out how to keep the Blunderdome
cold enough to keep it from melting. What if it doesn't work?
translation.de: damit es nicht schmilzt. Was, wenn es…

translation.en: Chico? Maybe now's a good time for a banana break.
translation.de: Vielleicht ist es Zeit für eine Bananen-Pause.

translation.en: [Chico] Okay, the monster wants ice cream, -but we can't keep the ice cream cold. -[buzzing]
translation.de: Ok, das Monster will Eis, aber wir können es nicht kühlen.

translation.en: Fridgey Boo Boo can only keep it cold when it's inside him.
-Outside, it melts! -[buzzing]
Because there's no insulation.
Insulation!
Blazing bananas, that's it! We need insulation.
translation.de: Blitzende Bananen, das ist es! Wir brauchen Isolierung.

translation.en: Oh yeah!
If we insulate the entire Blunderdome, we can keep the ice cream cold.
translation.de: Isolieren wir die Arena, können wir das Eis kühlen.

translation.en: Great idea!
Rainbow, activate foam cannon and prepare to insulate.
translation.de: Rainbow, Schaumkanone aktivieren und Isolierung vorbereiten!

translation.en: -Hang on to your whiskers! -[engine revs]
Folks, I can't believe what I'm seeing.
The Fix-It Force are insulating the Blunderdome with foam!
translation.de: Das Tüftler-Team isoliert die Arena mit Schaum!

translation.en: -We did it! -Yeah!
[Chico] The ice cream isn't melting!
It's an insulation sensation!
-[Clark and Thunder] Whoa! -She is hungry!
All full!
-[all cheering] -She's full!
Bye-bye!
We saved the city, Fridgebot.
Now there's only one thing left to do…
[Chico] Ice cream! Come get your ice cream.
Mmm! Thanks for the ice cream, Chico.
The Ice Cream Monster's gone for good! Thank you, Chico.
translation.de: Das Eismonster ist weg! Danke, Chico.

translation.en: We couldn't have done it without Fridgey Boo Boo here.
Oh! I love you, Fridgey Boo Boo!
What is ice cream's favorite day of the week?
translation.de: Was ist das hellste Eis der Welt?

translation.en: [all] What is it?
Sunday!
Oh, Fridgey Boo Boo!
